divs: sighting detailsliberty mo. july 02 2012, i was sitting on my front porch looking at the sky, being an amateur astronomer for 45 years; well that���s what i do. at 10:15 pm i noticed a bright light coming up from the east behind the trees, like a helicopter spot light. but it had a strange tint to it (amber with orange glow) like it was behind a fire, my first thought. well it was getting brighter (closer) and when it cleared the trees for a lack of words it looked like a flying flame! so i rubbed my eyes to get the best look i could. it was in a lazy left turn (my left) and the only clear sky i had was the width of the house across the street. it seemed about 2000 feet up and less than a mile away. it was very bright, hard to look at bright. the object itself was a sphere\orb it was emitting an aura that looked like a plasma flame. i don���t know what it is but for now i will call it plasma. now very close to the orb the color was a very bright blue\white and as the plasma moved away from the orb it took on an amber color. the plasma seemed to go about 75% upward, 50% forward, 50% backward, and 25% downward in the shape of a flame. i could see what looked like interference lines in the plasma and seemed to be in motion (twinkle). this whole thing seemed to be surrounded by a containment field that glowed orange (like when you put your hand on a plasma ball-lamp). the speed it was going was about the same as a conventional aircraft and was silent. it left my view heading to the nne direction, mosby and excelsior springs area. that���s my 2 minutes with it. my opinion is this was a display ���look at me��� kind of thing. also as it left i could hear a jet in a turn west of me, like kci was diverting traffic away from the area.
